name: G.O.L.D ! - Goblins Outventures Loot Diggin'
description:
(Please use fullscreen mode to get full experince)

Welcome to G.O.L.D ! - Goblins Outventure Loot Diggin'!

Here we have:

BBM - Big Bad Magnets

One asteriod to dig in (And not get out of it's bounds or it will be a biiig BOOM)

True Gobby' drilla

And a lot of minerals to loot (but beware of oil - it will get your drilla faster)
